text:
[Verse]
Woke up to a new day glow
Colors in the sky just flow
Chasing light where shadows go
Feeling magic in my soul

[Verse 2]
Raindrops fall but they can't stay
Washing all the gray away
Painting skies from blue to pink
Rainbow dreams in every blink

[Chorus]
Rainbow dreams come alive
In my heart they always thrive
Bright and bold through the night
Shining in the morning light

[Bridge]
Every hue and every shade
Mix together memories made
Never fade they always gleam
In my rainbow-colored dream

[Verse 3]
Dance beneath the colors high
Feel the warmth as time goes by
Every shade a new surprise
Rainbow dreams don't tell lies

[Chorus]
Rainbow dreams come alive
In my heart they always thrive
Bright and bold through the night
Shining in the morning light
title: Rainbow Dreams
